Selectors:
Username field: //input[@name='username']
Password field: //input[@name='password']
Submit button: //button[@type='submit']
Workflow:
1. Open the page : https://practicetestautomation.com/practice-test-login/
2. Enter the username: 'student'
3. Enter the password: 'Password123'
4. Click submit
5. Verify successful login
6. Verify 'Log out' button is visible
Additional Details:
Create a Page Object model framework structure using Testng
Add Logger
Add assertions in Step 6
